name: Qatar NEW Q-Suite Business Class
description:
Get a free trial of Squarespace and 10% off at http://Squarespace.com/dennis 

Qatar's new business class Q-Suite sets the new standard in international business class.  These seats are amazing!  Each seat is its own little cabin with a closing door to give total privacy. 

The seats in the middle are grouped into pods of 4 which can be opened up so that families and business colleagues travelling together can all see each other, eat together or celebrate special occasions - just like I did on this flight where we celebrated my  parent's 49th wedding anniversary.  

This business class flight review covers the new Qatar Q-Suite Business Class on their Boeing 777 aircraft.  The review covers checking, the Qatar Heathrow Business Lounge, boarding, take-off, the famous Qatar in-flight service and of course the seat which converts into a lay flat bed.  

This flight was filmed on QR 8 from London Heathrow to Doha.  See below for more details.   

For more videos check out my channel where you'll find a range of airline reviews in economy, business and first class including Emirates, British Airways, Etihad, Qatar, Qantas, Cathay Pacific, Singapore Airlines, LATAM, Baltic Air, Turkish Airlines and more

Route:    London Heathrow to Doha
Length:  3,259miles, 6:35 hrs
Flight:     QR8
When:    November 2017
Aircraft:  Boeing 777-300ER   registration A7-BEL
Seat:       2E
Camera:  Sony FDR-AXP55
Music:  

This video is sponsored by Squarespace however I retain total editorial control and all opinions are my own.
